meanings.definition: Money received, especially on a regular basis, for work or through investments.
meanings.sent1: Her income from her job helps her pay for groceries.
meanings.sent2: He calculated his monthly income to budget for rent and bills.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's income of acorns was stolen by a mischievous raccoon.
meanings.sent4: The income of knowledge gained from books is priceless.
meanings.sent5: The income of happiness from spending time with loved ones is invaluable.

meanings.definition: The amount of money received during a particular period of time.
meanings.sent1: Their income for the year exceeded their expectations.
meanings.sent2: She carefully tracked her weekly income to save for a vacation.
meanings.sent3: The income of raindrops during the storm flooded the streets.
meanings.sent4: The income of sunlight brightened up the gloomy day.
meanings.sent5: The income of laughter echoed through the room, bringing joy to all.
